DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to understand if Rivaroxaban can improve treatment satisfaction of Warfarin patients and assess the safety and effectiveness of Xarelto in real clinical practice. A total of 725 patients are to be enrolled and followed for a 6 months.period. QOL survey will be conducted at month 0, 3, 6 using ACTS/TSQM. This study is categorized as a regulatory post-marketing surveillance in Japan, and it is a local prospective and observational study of patients who have received Xarelto for SPAF.
